page.title: 07HOUSING STRONE/MAUKINHILL
page.content: In the {Strone/Maukinhill}area of Greenock 90% of the houses are owned by the Council and 10% are privately owned.There are 1374 council houses. The oldest houses were built in 1934 and there is an ongoing private development at the moment. At present there are 76 empty houses. The biggest and main problem regarding housing in this area is {vandalism}. Very few of the houses have dampness. A large majority of houses have been { {modernised}. Central heating has been installed in many and windows and kitchen units have been replaced. The exteriors have been painted. Although the {Housing Department} receives very few complaints about housing conditions, there is still a low demand for houses in the Strone/Maukinhill area of Greenock.
